resources.string: NMod load failed,but the game can still be opened.
An unexpected error caused while importing NMod.
Importing this nmod failed because this is not a valid nmod file.Please make sure it\'s zip formatted.
ModdedPE decoded this NMod successfully but there is no nmod_manifest.json found.Please make sure it\'s a valid NMod.
An io exception caused while importing NMod.
A json syntax error caused while reading nmod_manifest.json.Please check it out.
Invalid package name defined in manifest.Element "package_name" must be a java-styled package name.
No package name found in nmod_manifest.json.Please add element "package_name"(String).
Inequal package name defined in AndroidManifest.xml and nmod_manifest.json.ModdedPE couldn\'t decide which package name to use.
ModdedPE found two nmod_manifest.json in this file but didn\'t know which one to read.Please delete one.(/nmod_manifest.json or /assets/nmod_manifest.json)
ModdedPE found an imported nmod with same package name.The new one has successfully imported and replaced the old one.
The NMod has successfully been imported!
Where do you want to pick NMod from?
An error was caused by the NMod %1$s.The NMod is disabled now,you can continue to enjoy the game!
Do you really want to delete it?It may be lost for a long time.(REALLY LONG!)

string-array.name: perloading_tips_text
string-array.item: APK formatted nmod can also be imported~
Do you know?You can scroll left or right to chage page in the Main Page.
You\'d better import NMods by picking files rather than picking applications.
There is somethings strange in the creeper face of main page:)
Github contains the source code of ModdedPE~
I have an apple~I have a pen~
Please send a message to @model_part on twitter if you want to translate ModdedPE~
It\'s impossible that ModdedPE will support ModPE scripts.
Do you want to load NMods in your own launcher?(About->NModAPI
ModdedPE will never show any Ads.
Native-Mod is the full-write of NMod.
Why don\'t you follow @model_part on twitter?

resources.string: ModdedPE has found an unsupported version of Minecraft:PE (%1$s) on this device.(ModdedPE only supports %2$s!)\nIf you continue opening the game,ModdedPE may crash or cause issues.
With same mode on,ModdedPE won\'t load any NMod and all functions in ModdedPE\'s settings won\'t work.
ModdedPE is a launcher of Minecraft:PE,but we haven\'t find Minecraft:PE(Made by Mojang) on this device.
No NMod found on this device.
